actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1238.
Measure called up by special rule in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #352 (400-0).

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to allow all expenses of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to be obtained directly from the contingent fund of the House of Representatives upon vouchers signed by its chairman and ranking minority members.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #352 (400-0)) Provides that during the remainder of the 94th Congress all of the expenses of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct shall be paid from the contingent fund of the House of Representatives upon vouchers signed by its chairman and ranking minority member; and that its expenditures for investigations shall be reported to the House every 60 days in the Congressional Record.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to allow all expenses of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to be obtained directly from the contingent fund of the House of Representatives upon vouchers signed by its chairman and ranking minority members.
